items.sentence: Tom couldn\'t remember the combination for the safe.
Tom can\'t decide unless you tell him all the facts.
Tom can\'t help wondering why Mary changed her mind.
Tom can\'t listen to music without tapping his foot.
I\'d like to live in Boston for the rest of my life.
I\'ll have to ask Tom to come over and do it for me.
I\'ve been reading a really interesting book lately.
Tom entered the unlocked apartment without knocking.
Tom and Mary weren\'t wearing their school uniforms.
I thought I\'d surprise Mary and take her to dinner.
I thought you\'d end up going to the party with Tom.
You know that Tom doesn\'t need do that, don\'t you?
I don\'t know who Tom wants to go to Australia with.
Tom was busy and didn\'t have a chance to eat lunch.
You\'re the next in line for promotion, aren\'t you?
I wish I could speak French half as well as you can.
Neither Tom nor Mary has been suspended from school.
Except for Tom, everyone in the office left at 2:30.
For all Tom knew, Mary might be in Boston with John.
How can I keep my email account from getting hacked?
How can you treat your own flesh and blood that way?
How could there be a storm on a day as nice as this?
Tom borrowed three hundred dollars three months ago.
Tom bragged that he was the best player on the team.
It was harder to do that than I thought it would be.
Does anyone know how Tom will be going to Australia?
Do you mean you didn\'t know Tom had gotten married?
Tom spends about an hour a day practicing the piano.
Tom spends less time studying French than Mary does.
Tom spoke very quietly, but loud enough to be heard.
I haven\'t yet seen the movie you\'re talking about.
Tom saw something different than the rest of us did.
Tom says he goes jogging three or four times a week.
I\'m sure Tom won\'t want to eat anything right now.
I\'m sure it\'ll be easy to convince Tom to do that.
Tom told everyone that he wanted to become a barber.
Tom glanced at the note that Mary had handed to him.
Tom got up from the table and went into the kitchen.
Tom was lonely and wished he had someone to talk to.
I\'ve seen a lot of good-looking women in Australia.
I\'m feeling much better today than I was yesterday.
I\'m getting sick and tired of all your complaining.
I\'m going to miss all of you when I move to Boston.
I don\'t think we have enough food to feed everyone.
There isn\'t much doubt about the cause of the fire.
I only threatened to shoot Tom. I didn\'t shoot him.
Someone broke into Tom\'s house while he was asleep.
Why are you pretending you can\'t understand French?
Why didn\'t you tell me you had a friend in the FBI?
Why didn\'t you tell me you were lactose intolerant?
